<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1474716_lva_vehicle_tracker</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>update loaner vehicle status</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var trackerStatus = current.vehicle_status;  // Vehicle Status on the tracker
    var vehicleRef = current.vehicle;            // Reference to the loaner vehicle

    if (!vehicleRef) return;  // If no vehicle is linked, do nothing

    var newStatus = "";

    // Determine the new status for the Loaner Vehicle
    if (["Pending Release", "Out on Field", "Returned for Inspection", "Sent for Servicing"].includes(trackerStatus)) {
        newStatus = "Unavailable";
    } else if (trackerStatus === "Returned to Warehouse") {
        newStatus = "Available";
    } else if (trackerStatus === "Decommissioned") {
        newStatus = "Decommissioned";
    }

    // If we figured out a new status, update the vehicle
    if (newStatus) {
        var vehicleGR = new GlideRecord('x_1474716_lva_vehicle_loaner_catalog');
        if (vehicleGR.get(vehicleRef)) {
            vehicleGR.status = newStatus;
            vehicleGR.update();
        }
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-14 04:20:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>613235b283422210def956d6feaad398</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>update loaner vehicle status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1474716_lva">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_613235b283422210def956d6feaad398</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-14 04:27:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=613235b283422210def956d6feaad398"/></record_update>
